Returns:

metadata (pandas DataFrame): A pandas DataFrame with the metadata.

trackerlab.detectors.connected_components(image, threshold, min_area, max_area, max_features, invert=False)[source]¶

Detect features using connected-component labeling.

Arguments:

image (float array): The image data.

threshold (float): The threshold value.

…

Returns:

features (pandas DataFrame): A pandas DataFrame with the detected features.

image_out (2D array): The output image.

trackerlab.detectors.difference_of_gaussians(image_in, min_sigma=1, max_sigma=30, sigma_ratio=1.6, threshold=0.1, overlap=0.5)[source]¶

Detect features using difference of Gaussians.

Arguments:

image_in (2D array): The input, grayscale image, the features are assumed to be light on dark background (white on black).

min_sigma (float): The minimum standard deviation for Gaussian kernel. Reduce to detect smaller features.

max_sigma (float): The maximum standard deviation for Gaussian kernel. Increase to detect larger features.

sigma_ratio (float): The ratio between the standard deviation of Gaussian kernels used for computing the difference of Gaussians.

threshold (float): The absolute lower bound for scale space maxima. Local maxima smaller than threshold are ignored. Reduce to detect blobs with less intensities.

overlap (float): A value between 0 and 1. If the area of two features overlaps by a fraction greater than threshold, the smaller feature is eliminated.

Returns:

features (pandas DataFrame): A pandas DataFrame with the detected features.

image_out (2D array): The output image.

trackerlab.detectors.hough_transform(image, sigma, low_threshold, high_threshold, min_radius, max_radius, threshold)[source]¶

Detect features using circular Hough transfrom.

Arguments:

image (2D array): Image data.

sigma (float): Sigma value for the Canny edge detector.

low_threshold (int): Minimum radius in pixels.

high_threshold (int): Maximum radius in pixels.

min_radius (int): Minimum radius in pixels.

max_radius (int): Maximum radius in pixels.

threshold (int): Threshold for selecting the most prominent circles.

Returns:

features (pandas DataFrame): Pandas DataFrame with the detected features.

image_out (2D array): The output image.

file (string): The path to the TDMS file.

None

trackerlab.utils.read_csv_features(file)[source]¶

Read CSV features file (*_features.csv) generated from the TrackerLab app.

Arguments:

file (string): The path to the CSV file.

Returns:

features (pandas DataFrame): A pandas DataFrame with the detected features.

metadata (pandas DataFrame): A pandas DataFrame with the metadata.

protocol (string): A string containing the content of the protocol file.
